name: Giga Death
effect: [Main] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, place up to 10 of your opponent's suspended Digimon at the bottom of their owners' decks in any order.
security_effect: [Security] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon. Then, return 1 of your opponent's suspended Digimon to the bottom of its owner's deck.
